text:
A 28-year-old youth with M.Tech qualification committed suicide by hanging at his residence in Mudaliarpet on Saturday morning.

The police gave the name of the deceased as V. Saravanan (28) of Gayathri Nagar in Mudaliarpet. Police sources said that frustration over unemployment could have been the reason for him to have taken the extreme step.

Saravanan had asked for a sum of Rs.15 lakh from his father to begin his own business as he was unemployed.

His father Vinobha, a farmer, owned some agricultural properties.

But his father had asked for some time to get the money as he had to sell some of his agricultural property to obtain a good amount.

However Saravanan picked up a quarrel with his father on Thursday.

Unconvinced by his father’s promises, he broke down in frustration.

Saravanan's family members found him hanging at his room the next day morning. – Special Correspondent
title: Engineer commits suicide
